mapper.insert: INSERT INTO novel (mem_id, img_url, nv_writer,nv_title, nv_contents, nv_state, nv_datetime, nv_updatetime, nv_point) VALUES (#{memId},#{imgUrl},#{nvWriter},#{nvTitle}, #{nvContents},#{nvState},NOW(),NOW(),#{nvPoint})
mapper.select: SELECT nv_id, mem_id, img_url, nv_writer, nv_title, nv_hit, nv_comment_count, nv_reviewpoint, nv_reviewcount, nv_datetime, nv_point FROM novel where nv_id = #{nv_id};
mapper.update: UPDATE novel SET img_url = #{img_url}, nv_writer = #{nv_writer}, nv_title = #{nv_title}, nv_contents = #{nv_contents}, nv_state = #{nv_state}, nv_updatetime = NOW() WHERE nv_id = #{nv_id}
update novel set nv_state = 1 where nv_id = #{nv_id}
update novel set nv_hit=nv_hit+1 where nv_id = #{nv_id}
update novel set nv_reviewpoint= nv_reviewpoint + #{point}, nv_reviewcount= nv_reviewcount +1 where nv_id = #{nv_id}
update novel set nv_reviewpoint= nv_reviewpoint - #{point}, nv_reviewcount= nv_reviewcount - 1 where nv_id = #{nv_id}
update novel set nv_comment_count=nv_comment_count+1 where nv_id = #{nv_id}
update novel set nv_comment_count=nv_comment_count-1 where nv_id = #{nv_id}
